info.title: Gram API Description
info.description: Gram is the tools platform for AI agents

tags: mcp
post.description:
MCP server endpoint for a toolset.

**Required security scopes for apikey**:
  * `consumer`

**Required security scopes for project_slug**:
  * `consumer`

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The environment to access via MCP.

name.description: The name of the package.

example.name: Repellat voluptates earum aut.
example.version: Est et voluptas eveniet est vero in.

asset_id.description: The ID of the uploaded asset.
asset_id.example: Harum ullam at magnam unde et sed.

name.description: The name to give the document as it will be displayed in UIs.

slug.description: The slug to give the document as it will be displayed in URLs.

example.name: Sed voluptas pariatur error excepturi quia est.

name.description: The name of the package to add.

version.description: The version of the package to add. If omitted, the latest version will be used.

content_length.description: The content length of the asset

content_type.description: The content type of the asset
content_type.example: Dolor ut vitae qui qui quasi eum.

created_at.description: The creation date of the asset.

id.description: The ID of the asset
id.example: Consectetur ut repudiandae commodi perferendis enim cum.

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the asset
sha256.example: Earum et similique voluptates non cumque.

updated_at.description: The last update date of the asset.
